articles.headline: Las Vegas Raiders QB Aidan O'Connell exits with wrist injury
articles.description: Following a 10-play, 32-yard scoring drive in the second quarter, Las Vegas Raiders backup quarterback Aidan O'Connell left the club's preseason finale against the Arizona Cardinals on Saturday at State Farm Stadium after sustaining a right wrist injury.

articles.headline: The 49ers spoil Trey Lance's return to the Bay Area with a 30-23 win over the Chargers
articles.description: — Trey Lance's return to the Bay Area led to three straight punts for the Los Angeles Chargers, who went on to lose 30-23 Saturday night to the San Francisco 49ers in the final exhibition game for both teams.

images.name: Curtis Robinson takes it to the house
images.caption: Curtis Robinson comes up with a pick-six to give the 49ers a 23-16 lead.

articles.headline: 2025 NFL preseason Week 3: Analysis, 53-man roster projections
articles.description: The final games of the 2025 preseason help flesh out key battles ahead of Tuesday's 53-man roster cuts.

images.name: Shavers Bills Bucs [608x342]
images.caption: Buffalo Bills wide receiver Tyrell Shavers scores past Tampa Bay Buccaneers cornerback Bryce Hall.

images.name: Bill Barnwell: Brian Robinson gives 49ers peace of mind
images.caption: Bill Barnwell sees a lot of upside in the 49ers' trade for running back Brian Robinson Jr.

articles.headline: San Francisco 49ers final 2025 projected roster
articles.description: The 49ers open the 2025 NFL season at the Seahawks on Sept. 7.

images.name: Why Orlovsky is hesitant about the 49ers this season
images.caption: Dan Orlovsky joins "The Pat McAfee Show" to break down the 49ers' prospects heading into the season.

articles.headline: Los Angeles Chargers final 2025 projected roster
articles.description: The Los Angeles Chargers open the 2025 NFL regular season against the Kansas City Chiefs on Sept. 5 in Sao Paulo, Brazil

images.name: Tim Hasselbeck: Losing Rashawn Slater a huge deal for Chargers
images.caption: Tim Hasselbeck breaks down what Rashawn Slater's season-ending injury means for Justin Herbert and the Chargers.

articles.headline: Tua Tagovailoa throws TD pass and is sacked twice as Dolphins beat Jaguars 14-6 to wrap preseason
articles.description: — Tua Tagovailoa threw a 25-yard touchdown pass and was sacked twice in his only action of the preseason, and the Miami Dolphins beat the Jacksonville Jaguars 14-6 on Saturday night.

images.name: Dolphins top Jaguars 14-6 in preseason finale
images.caption: Tua Tagovailoa throws a 25-yard touchdown pass, leads Miami to a 14-6 preseason victory over Jacksonville.
